text: Va cun ʙa onon gufta savad: "Ba on ci Alloh taolo nozil kardaast, imon ʙijovared", megujand: "Mo ʙa cize imon meovarem, ki ʙar xudi mo nozil sudaast" va ʙa ƣajri on kofir mesavand, dar hole ki on [Qur'on suxani] haq va tasdiqkunandai matoliʙe ast, ki ʙo xud dorand. [Ej pajomʙar, ʙa onon] Bigu: "Agar [rost megued va] mu'mined, pas, caro pajomʙaroni Allohro pes az in mekusted
